branchCategory.name: IDF*FS, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 100~150 w/Energy Saving Function, Standard Inlet Air Temperature
branchCategory.description: <p>Series IDF*FS refrigerated air dryers are larger units with improved ambient (113&deg;F/45&deg;C) and inlet (140&deg;F/60&deg;C) air temperatures.&nbsp; This energy saving design reduces the amount of heat exhausted by the dryer and can reduce power consumption during periods of reduced demand.</p>
